item.description:
Zhang Yimou is one of the world's most admired film-makers. After his historical epics, "Raise the Red Lantern" and "Ju Dou" he is most known for his recent forays into martial-arts films such as "Hero" and "House of Flying Daggers". In between he created more contemporary films about Chinese culture which are rarely featured on the big screen in the US. The Brattle is showing two of these, " To Live" and "The Road Home" as a double feature.

Here are links to The AllMovie Guide descriptions:

"To Live" http://www.allmovie.c...
"The Road Home" http://www.allmovie.c...

"To Live" starts at 2:30 and the meetup discussion will be after the screening of "The Road Home" which starts at 5:00.

As is the custom, Tom will be holding a meetup sign after The Road Home and then its off to discuss at a local restaurant.
item.name: Zhang Yimou at The Brattle
